edu.utsa.mobbed
Class Datadefs

Object
  Datadefs

public class Datadefs
extends Object

Handler class for DATADEFS table. The DATADEFS table identifies a piece of data (an array, a blob, or a stream).

Author:
Arif Hossain, Jeremy Cockfield, Kay Robbins

retrieveBlob

public static void retrieveBlob(Connection dbCon,
                                String filename,
                                String entityUuid,
                                boolean additional)
                         throws MobbedException
Retrieves a blob from the database.

Parameters:
dbCon - a connection to the database
filename - the name of the file that the blob will be written to
entityUuid - the entity UUID that is associated
additional - true if the blob is addition data, false if otherwise
Throws:
MobbedException - if an error occurs

Parameters:

datadefUuid - the data definition UUID that is associated
Returns:
a array that contains the numeric value data

MobbedException - if an error occurs

storeBlob

public static long storeBlob(Connection dbCon,
                             String filename,
                             String entityUuid,
                             boolean additional)
                      throws MobbedException
Stores a blob in the database.

Parameters:
dbCon - a connection to the database
filename - the name of the file that contains the blob
entityUuid - the entity UUID that is associated
additional - true if the blob is addition data, false if otherwise
Returns:
a oid associated with the blob stored
Throws:
MobbedException - if an error occurs
